I have yet to understand... how a boy, an 18, 19, a 2O-year-old... however old he was, lost here in Brazil, though he'd studied in Europe... how did that boy, along with Edgar Brazil... in a country devoid of cinematic tradition... succeeded in making such a synthesis of what was happening.
